## Midterm revisited

This homework is for 10 points of extra credit. 

1. Download the zipped folder with the material for your exam. 

    a. Unzip the folder (extract all), 
    b. double-click the R project contained in the folder. 
    c. In RStudio, open the R markdown file.

2. Answer all the questions provided in the exam. Use the comments provided to improve on your answers.


Due date: please refer to the website and Canvas for the due date. 

For the submission: submit your solution in an R Markdown file and (just for insurance) submit the corresponding html/word file with it.
